content.rendered:
There’s a three-pound universe sitting on the top of your body, and its health can transform your life.

Of course, I’m talking about the brain.

In the world of medicine, there’s a fundamental shift happening when it comes to our understanding of this complex and dynamic organ. Recent research has completely upended the idea that our brains are unchangeable. We now know that we have so much more control over disorders such as anxiety, depression, ADHD, dementia, and more.

Still, when it comes to this organ and its ability to create health or dis-ease, we’ve barely scratched the surface.

That’s why I am so excited about my docu-series, Broken Brain 2: The Body-Mind Connection.

This 8-part docu-series is a comprehensive collection of my research on the latest healing modalities available to support the intricate links between the brain and body. These are therapies I used to personally heal from my own health crisis, therapies that took me from bedridden to the best health of my life.

My hope is that they can do the same for you.

I was joined by more than 70 guest experts in the fields of Functional Medicine, nutrition, neurology, immunology, genetics, toxicity, and many other fascinating specialties to take a deep dive into the emerging science that can elevate our health and happiness. Plus, we feature patient stories that share accounts of real-life transformations using this holistic view of healing.

I hope you’re as excited as I am to dig into all of the incredible information in Broken Brain 2.
